types.html:
au volant (invariable)

  1. behind the wheel, at the wheel (driving a car)
    femme au volant, mort au tournant ― (please add an English translation of this usage example) (literally, “woman behind the wheel means death at the corner”)
  2. (of restaurants) drive-in
trans: behind the wheel, at the wheel

title: au volant
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /o vɔ.lɑ̃/
